hadadden lissafi: Nazarin sifofi na geometric da gine-gine da suka taso daga, ko siffanta su, hadaddun lambobi
hadaddun lambobi: Lambobin nau'in a + bi inda a da b suke ainihin lambobi
ainihin bangare: Kalmar a cikin hadadden lamba wadda ba ta ƙunshi naúrar hasashe a matsayin dalili ba
bangaren hasashe: Bangaren hadadden lamba wanda ke da raka'ar hasashe a matsayin dalili
hadaddun manifolds: Wurare a cikin hadadden lissafin lissafi waɗanda ke gaba ɗaya ne na masu lanƙwasa da filaye
hadaddun algebraic iri: Wurare a cikin hadadden lissafin lissafi waɗanda ke zama mafita ga daidaiton ɗabi'a
holomorphic gine-gine: Gine-gine a cikin hadadden lissafi masu rikitarwa-masu bambanta
\u0199aramin shirin samfurin: Shiri a cikin hadadden lissafin lissafi don rarrabuwa na hadaddun manifolds da hadadden nau'in algebraic
moduli sarari: Wurare a cikin hadadden lissafi wanda ke daidaita wani nau'in abu na geometric
calabi zato: Hasashen a cikin hadadden lissafin lissafi wanda Shing-Tung Yau ya tabbatar game da wanzuwar nau'in ma'auni na musamman akan ma'auni mai rikitarwa.
hitchin-kobayashi wasikun: Rubuce-rubuce a cikin hadadden lissafin lissafi tsakanin bargaren holomorphic vector bundles da mafita ga wani takamaiman ma'auni.
wasikun hodge na nonabelian: Wasiku a cikin hadadden lissafi tsakanin wasu nau'ikan hadaddun manifolds da wasu nau'ikan tsarin algebra
kahler-einstein metrics: Nau'o'in ma'auni na musamman akan ƙayyadaddun yawa waɗanda ke gamsar da wani yanayi
